New Records: Dhananjaya de Silva scored 66 runs in 42 balls
Key Match Events: Dhananjaya de Silva scored a half-century, Wanindu Hasaranga took 3 wickets for 13 runs, Rashid Khan took 2 wickets for 31 runs, Bhanuka Rajapaksa was caught behind by Gurbaz off Mujeeb Ur Rahman
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan captain Mohammad Nabi said they tried to put up a good score but the pitch was too slow and they fell short, Sri Lanka captain Dasun Shanaka said they found some consistency today and it is important to continue it in the next game
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka captain Dasun Shanaka said it was a good performance with bat and bowl, Afghanistan captain Mohammad Nabi said they did not bowl in right lines and lengths
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka moved to No. 3 in the Group 1 standings, Afghanistan is out of the T20 World Cup
